itemTooltip.italianfood.espresso: Gives you a quick energy boost for 1 minute
itemTooltip.italianfood.focaccia: Soft and savory, restores extra hunger!
itemTooltip.italianfood.pizza: A slice of joy, grants regeneration!
itemTooltip.italianfood.lasagna: Restores a lot of hunger and grants Resistance due to its rich, layered strength
itemTooltip.italianfood.grissino: Crunchy breadstick that make you feel light on your feet!
